original_text: I, Paul, need to ask you something. Perhaps you think that I am only humble when I am present there with you. You think that I only speak strongly to you when I am far away! Now I am away from you. But I am still humble and kind, like Christ is.
korean_text: 너희를 대면하면 유순하고 떠나 있으면 너희에 대하여 담대한 나 바울은 이제 그리스도의 온유와 관용으로 친히 너희를 권하고

sentences.original_text: I, Paul, need to ask you something.
sentences.korean_translation: 나, 바울은 당신에게 물을 것이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you think that I am only humble
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 당신은 나가 겸손하기만 하다고 생각할지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: when I am present there with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신과 함께 그곳에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: You think that I only speak strongly to you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 당신에게 강하게 말하기만 한다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: Now I am away from you.
But I am still humble and kind,
